title: Qezel Ozan Zanjan F.C.
text:
Qezel Ozan Zanjan Football Club is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Zanjan%20%28city%29">Zanjan</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. They currently compete in the <a href="2010%E2%80%9311%20Hazfi%20Cup">2010–11 Hazfi Cup</a>.
Season-by-Season.
